unable_to_generate_unique_code.name: Unable to Generate Unique Code
unable_to_generate_unique_code.description: When generating a new code for a new verification, the script was unable to find a unique one.

no_verification_found.name: No verification found matching the required parameters
no_verification_found.description: When attempting to find a verification, the database returned no matching results.

failed_to_create.name: Failed to Create New Verification
failed_to_create.description: There was a database error while creating a new verification.

failed_to_update.name: Failed to Update Existing Verification
failed_to_update.description: There was a database error while updating the information on an existing verification.

unknown_err.name: Unknown Error
unknown_err.description: There was an unexpected error of an unknown type.
